definitions.definition: A person whose job is to rivet .
examples: The riveter named Rosie was an iconic piece of American WWII propaganda.

definitions.definition: A machine or tool used to apply rivets .
examples: The beam couldn't support the weight of the riveter , so the workers were riveting by hand.

main_definition: A person whose job is to rivet .
secondary_definitions: A machine or tool used to apply rivets .
